PageWidgetPortable.Title: Retornos de pagamento automatizado
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>AGA_GN_HBRETORNOS_PGTOAUTO.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>0</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>true</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.TIPO = 'P' AND A.CONTA IN (SELECT B.HANDLE FROM FN_CONTASTESOURARIA B WHERE B.FILIAL IN @FILIAIS)</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/financeiro/RetornoPagtoAuto/Form.aspx</FormUrl> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
